alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 11:27PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pushmataha, southeastern Latimer and Le Flore Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1126 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Talihina to 2 miles south of Octavia. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Heavener... Talihina... Wister... Howe... Bokoshe... Fanshawe... Albion... Octavia... Talimena State Park... Big Cedar... Lake Wister State Park... Whitesboro... Muse... Shady Point... Summerfield... Heavener Runestone Park... Hodgen... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for west central Arkansas...and southeastern Oklahoma.
